timeline.message:
HandledScreen parameters and renames

- Mapped a lot of parameters in HandledScreen
- draw[Foreground/Background] -> render[Foreground/Background]
  for consistency with Screen.render and Screen.renderBackground

timeline.bodyText: Just need to ensure the draw vs render consistency. Why draw than render here?
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -62,13 +65,21 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_465 net/minecraft/client/gui/screen/ingame/HandledScre
 		ARG 1 keyCode
 		ARG 2 scanCode
 	METHOD method_2385 drawSlot (Lnet/minecraft/class_4587;Lnet/minecraft/class_1735;)V

replies.bodyText: I think I'll revert the renderBackground/Foreground renames for now because I don't feel like standardising it across all screens (someone should still do that, though).
replies.author: Juuxel
